item.title: Biden’s Parting Protectionist Folly
item.description: Now ex-president Biden’s decision to block the sale of U.S. Steel to a Japanese company is unjustifiable.

item.title: Joe Biden’s Final Corrupt Acts
item.description: History will not be kind to the 46th president.

item.title: SCOTUS Should Affirm Parents’ Right to Opt Out of Gender Ideology in Public Schools
item.description: Montgomery County parents have asked the Supreme Court to secure their right to protect their children from radical curricula. The Court should agree.

item.title: They Gave Trump the Center, and He Took It
item.description: Out of touch and radical Democrats made Trump look like the normal one.

item.title: A Trump Inaugural Speech for a Trump Presidency
item.description: The address was another sign that the newly sworn-in president intends to govern the way he ran.
